metadataAttributes.Title: Accounting for Mergers and Acquisitions: Foundations
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course aims at assisting you in interpreting financial accounting information related to inter-corporate investments. The course will cover three main topics over four modules: (i) accounting for passive, significant influence, and control type of inter-corporate investments, (ii) special issues and considerations in inter-corporate investments, and (iii) special types of inter-corporate investments.
